entry.title: 桃花源记
entry.content: 晋太元中，武陵人捕鱼为业。缘溪行，忘路之远近。忽逢桃花林，夹岸数百步，中无杂树，芳草鲜美，落英缤纷，渔人甚异之。复前行，欲穷其林。林尽水源，便得一山，山有小口，仿佛若有光。便舍船，从口入。初极狭，才通人。复行数十步，豁然开朗。土地平旷，屋舍俨然，有良田美池桑竹之属。阡陌交通，鸡犬相闻。其中往来种作，男女衣着，悉如外人。黄发垂髫，并怡然自乐。见渔人，乃大惊，问所从来。具答之。便要还家，设酒杀鸡作食。村中闻有此人，咸来问讯。自云先世避秦时乱，率妻子邑人来此绝境，不复出焉，遂与外人间隔。问今是何世，乃不知有汉，无论魏晋。此人一一为具言所闻，皆叹惋。余人各复延至其家，皆出酒食。停数日，辞去。此中人语云：“不足为外人道也。”既出，得其船，便扶向路，处处志之。及郡下，诣太守，说如此。太守即遣人随其往，寻向所志，遂迷，不复得路。南阳刘子骥，高尚士也，闻之，欣然规往。未果，寻病终，后遂无问津者。

entry.content: <pre><code><div class="poem-detail-item-content"> <p class="poem-detail-main-text" id="body_p"> <span id="body_1_0" data="means_1_0"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8fd9\u91cc\u6307\u5218\u5907\u3002&quot;">先帝</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5f00\u521b\uff0c\u521b\u7acb\u3002&quot;">创</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u7edf\u4e00\u4e2d\u539f\u7684\u5927\u4e1a\u3002&quot;">业</span>未半<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8868\u8f6c\u6298\u3002&quot;">而</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u4e2d\u9014\u3002&quot;">中道</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u6b7b\u3002\u5d29\uff0c\u53e4\u4ee3\u79f0\u5e1d\u738b\u3001\u7687\u540e\u4e4b\u6b7b\u3002\u6b82\uff0c\u6b7b\u4ea1\u3002&quot;">崩殂</span>，</span><span id="body_1_1" data="means_1_1">今天下<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5929\u4e0b\u5206\u4e3a\u4e09\u4e2a\u56fd\u5bb6\uff08\u5373\u9b4f\u3001\u8700\u3001\u5434\u4e09\u56fd)\u3002&quot;">三分</span>，</span><span id="body_1_2" data="means_1_2"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u6307\u8700\u6c49\u56fd\u529b\u8584\u5f31\uff0c\u5904\u5883\u8270\u96be\u3002\u76ca\u5dde\uff0c\u8fd9\u91cc\u6307\u8700\u6c49\u3002\u75b2\u5f0a\uff0c\u4eba\u529b\u75b2\u60eb\uff0c\u6c11\u751f\u51cb\u655d\uff0c\u56f0\u82e6\u7a77\u4e4f\u3002&quot;">益州疲弊</span>，</span><span id="body_1_3" data="means_1_3"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8fd9\u3002&quot;">此</span>诚危急存亡之<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u65f6\u5019\u3002&quot;">秋</span>也。</span><span id="body_1_4" data="means_1_4"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u4f46\u662f&quot;">然</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u4f8d\u5949\u3002&quot;">侍</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5b88\u536b&quot;">卫</span>之臣不<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u61c8\u6020\uff0c\u653e\u677e\u3002&quot;">懈</span>于<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u671d\u5ef7\u4e0a\u3002&quot;">内</span>，</span><span id="body_1_5" data="means_1_5">忠<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5fd7\u5411\u3002&quot;">志</span>之<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5c06\u58eb\u3002&quot;">士</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u594b\u4e0d\u987e\u8eab\u3002&quot;">忘身</span>于<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u671d\u5ef7\u5916\uff0c\u6307\u6218\u573a\u4e0a\u3002&quot;">外</span>者，</span><span id="body_1_6" data="means_1_6"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8fde\u8bcd\u3002\u8fde\u63a5\u4e0a\u4e00\u53e5\u6216\u4e0a\u4e00\u6bb5\uff0c\u8868\u793a\u539f\u56e0\u3002&quot;">盖</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8ffd\u5ff5\u3002&quot;">追</span>先帝之<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u7279\u6b8a\u7684\u5bf9\u5f85\uff0c\u5373\u4f18\u5f85\u3001\u539a\u9047\u3002&quot;">殊遇</span>，</span><span id="body_1_7" data="means_1_7"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u60f3\u8981\u3002&quot;">欲</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u62a5\u7b54\u3002&quot;">报</span>之于陛下也。</span><span id="body_1_8" data="means_1_8">诚宜<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u6269\u5927\u5723\u660e\u7684\u542c\u95fb\uff0c\u610f\u601d\u662f\u8981\u540e\u4e3b\u5e7f\u6cdb\u5730\u542c\u53d6\u522b\u4eba\u7684\u610f\u89c1\u3002\u5f00\u5f20\uff1a\u6269\u5927\u3002\u5723\uff1a\u5723\u660e&quot;">开张圣听</span>，</span><span id="body_1_9" data="means_1_9">以<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u53d1\u626c\u5149\u5927\u3002&quot;">光</span>先帝<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u9057\u7559\u7684\u7f8e\u5fb7\u3002&quot;"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u7ed9\u4e88\u3002&quot;">遗</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u9053\u5fb7\u3002&quot;">德</span></span>，</span><span id="body_1_10" data="means_1_10"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8fd9\u91cc\u662f\u52a8\u8bcd\uff0c\u5f62\u4f5c\u52a8\uff0c\u610f\u601d\u662f\u53d1\u626c\u6269\u5927\u3002\u4e5f\u4f5c\u201c\u6062\u5b8f\u201d\u3002\u6062\uff1a\u5927\u3002\u5f18\uff1a\u5927\u3001\u5bbd\u3002&quot;">恢弘</span>志士之<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5fd7\u6c14\u3002&quot;">气</span>，</span><span id="body_1_11" data="means_1_11">不宜<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8fc7\u5206\u770b\u8f7b\u81ea\u5df1\u3002\u5984\uff1a\u968f\u4fbf\uff0c\u80e1\u4e71\uff0c\u8f7b\u7387\u3002\u83f2\u8584\uff1a\u5fae\u8584\u3002&quot;">妄自菲薄</span>，</span><span id="body_1_12" data="means_1_12"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8bf4\u8bdd\u4e0d\u6070\u5f53\u3002\u5f15\u55bb\uff1a\u5f15\u7528\u3001\u6bd4\u55bb\u3002\u8fd9\u91cc\u662f\u8bf4\u8bdd\u7684\u610f\u601d\u3002\u4e49\uff1a\u9002\u5b9c\uff0c\u6070\u5f53\u3002&quot;">引喻失义</span>，</span><span id="body_1_13" data="means_1_13">以塞忠<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u76f4\u8a00\u89c4\u529d\uff0c\u4f7f\u6539\u6b63\u9519\u8bef\u3002\u8fd9\u91cc\u6307\u8fdb\u8c0f\u3002&quot;">谏</span>之路也。</span> </p> <p id="means_p" class="poem-detail-main-text body-means-p"> <span id="means_1_0" data="body_1_0">先帝开创的大业未完成一半却中途去世了。</span><span id="means_1_1" data="body_1_1">现在天下分为三国，</span><span id="means_1_2" data="body_1_2">指蜀汉国力薄弱，处境艰难。</span><span id="means_1_3" data="body_1_3">这确实是国家危急存亡的时期啊。</span><span id="means_1_4" data="body_1_4">不过宫廷里侍从护卫的官员不懈怠，</span><span id="means_1_5" data="body_1_5">战场上忠诚有志的将士们奋不顾身，</span><span id="means_1_6" data="body_1_6">大概是他们追念先帝对他们的特别的知遇之恩（作战的原因），</span><span id="means_1_7" data="body_1_7">想要报答在陛下您身上。</span><span id="means_1_8" data="body_1_8">（陛下）你实在应该扩大圣明的听闻，</span><span id="means_1_9" data="body_1_9">来发扬光大先帝遗留下来的美德，</span><span id="means_1_10" data="body_1_10">振奋有远大志向的人的志气，</span><span id="means_1_11" data="body_1_11">不应当随便看轻自己，</span><span id="means_1_12" data="body_1_12">说不恰当的话，</span><span id="means_1_13" data="body_1_13">以致于堵塞人们忠心地进行规劝的言路。</span> </p> <p class="poem-detail-main-text" id="body_p"> <span id="body_2_0" data="means_2_0"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u6307\u7687\u5bab\u4e2d\u3002&quot;">宫中</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u6307\u671d\u5ef7\u4e2d\u3002&quot;">府中</span>，</span><span id="body_2_1" data="means_2_1"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5168\uff0c\u90fd\u3002&quot;">俱</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u505a\u3002&quot;">为</span>一<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u6574\u4f53\u3002&quot;">体</span>，</span><span id="body_2_2" data="means_2_2"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u63d0\u5347\uff0c\u63d0\u62d4\u3002&quot;">陟</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u60e9\u7f5a\u3002&quot;">罚</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5584\u6076\uff0c\u8fd9\u91cc\u5f62\u5bb9\u8bcd\u7528\u4f5c\u52a8\u8bcd\u3002\u610f\u601d\u662f\u201c\u8bc4\u8bba\u4eba\u7269\u7684\u597d\u574f\u201d\u3002\u81e7\u5426\uff1a\u5584\u6076\u3002&quot;">臧否</span>，</span><span id="body_2_3" data="means_2_3">不宜<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8fd9\u91cc\u504f\u91cd\u5728\u5f02\u3002&quot;">异同</span>。</span><span id="body_2_4" data="means_2_4">若<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u901a\u201c\u53c8\u201d\uff0c\u8ddf\u5728\u6570\u8bcd\u540e\u9762\u8868\u793a\u7ea6\u6570\u3002&quot;">有</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u505a\u5978\u90aa\u4e8b\u60c5\uff0c\u72af\u79d1\u6761\u6cd5\u4ee4\u3002&quot;"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u4e3a\u975e\u4f5c\u6b79\u3002&quot;">作奸</span>犯<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u79d1\u6761\uff0c\u6cd5\u4ee4\u3002&quot;">科</span></span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u548c\u3002&quot;">及</span>为忠善者，</span><span id="body_2_5" data="means_2_5">宜<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u4ea4\u7ed9\u3002&quot;">付</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u804c\u6709\u4e13\u53f8\uff0c\u5c31\u662f\u4e13\u95e8\u7ba1\u7406\u67d0\u79cd\u4e8b\u60c5\u7684\u5b98\u3002&quot;">有司</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u51ed\u5b9a\u3002&quot;">论</span>其刑<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u53d7\u8d4f\u3002&quot;">赏</span>，</span><span id="body_2_6" data="means_2_6">以<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5f70\u663e\uff0c\u663e\u626c\u3002&quot;">昭</span>陛下<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u516c\u5e73\u3002&quot;">平</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u4e25\u660e\u3002&quot;">明</span>之<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u6cbb\u3002&quot;">理</span>，</span><span id="body_2_7" data="means_2_7">不宜<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u504f\u8892\u79c1\u60c5\uff0c\u4e0d\u516c\u6b63\u3002&quot;">偏私</span>，</span><span id="body_2_8" data="means_2_8">使<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5bab\u5185\u548c\u671d\u5ef7\u5211\u8d4f\u4e4b\u6cd5\u4e0d\u540c\u3002&quot;"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u6307\u5bab\u5185\u548c\u671d\u5ef7\u3002&quot;">内外</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5211\u8d4f\u4e4b\u6cd5\u4e0d\u540c\u3002\u6cd5\uff1a\u6cd5\u5236\u3002&quot;">异法</span></span>也。</span> </p> <p id="means_p" class="poem-detail-main-text body-means-p"> <span id="means_2_0" data="body_2_0">皇宫中和朝廷里的大臣，</span><span id="means_2_1" data="body_2_1">本都是一个整体，</span><span id="means_2_2" data="body_2_2">奖惩功过，</span><span id="means_2_3" data="body_2_3">不应有所不同。</span><span id="means_2_4" data="body_2_4">如有作恶违法的人，或行为忠善的人，</span><span id="means_2_5" data="body_2_5">都应该交给主管官吏评定对他们的惩奖，</span><span id="means_2_6" data="body_2_6">以显示陛下处理国事的公正严明,</span><span id="means_2_7" data="body_2_7">而不应当有偏袒和私心，</span><span id="means_2_8" data="body_2_8">使宫内和朝廷奖罚方法不同。</span> </p> <p class="poem-detail-main-text" id="body_p"> <span id="body_3_0" data="means_3_0">侍中、</span><span id="body_3_1" data="means_3_1">侍郎郭攸之、</span><span id="body_3_2" data="means_3_2">费祎、</span><span id="body_3_3" data="means_3_3">董允等，</span><span id="body_3_4" data="means_3_4">此皆<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5584\u826f\u8bda\u5b9e\uff0c\u8fd9\u91cc\u5f62\u5bb9\u8bcd\u505a\u540d\u8bcd\uff0c\u6307\u5584\u826f\u8bda\u5b9e\u7684\u4eba\u3002&quot;"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5584\u826f\u53ef\u9760\u3002&quot;">良</span>实</span>，</span><span id="body_3_5" data="means_3_5">志<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u601d\u60f3\uff0c\u5fc3\u601d\u3002&quot;">虑</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5fe0\u8bda\u7eaf\u6b63\u3002&quot;">忠纯</span>，</span><span id="body_3_6" data="means_3_6"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u56e0\u4e3a\u8fd9\uff0c\u56e0\u6b64\u3002&quot;">是以</span>先帝<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u9009\u62d4\u3002\u7b80\uff1a\u6311\u9009\u3002\u62d4\uff1a\u9009\u62d4\u3002&quot;">简拔</span>以遗陛下。</span><span id="body_3_7" data="means_3_7">愚以为宫中之事，</span><span id="body_3_8" data="means_3_8">事无大小，</span><span id="body_3_9" data="means_3_9"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u90fd\u62ff\u6765\u95ee\u95ee\u4ed6\u4eec\u3002\u6089\uff1a\u526f\u8bcd\uff0c\u90fd\uff0c\u5168\u3002\u54a8\uff1a\u8be2\u95ee\uff0c\u5f81\u6c42\u610f\u89c1\u3002&quot;"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5168\u3001\u90fd\u3002&quot;">悉</span>以<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8be2\u95ee\u3002&quot;">咨</span>之</span>，</span><span id="body_3_10" data="means_3_10">然后施行，</span><span id="body_3_11" data="means_3_11">必得<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5f25\u8865\uff0c\u8865\u6551\u3002\u9619\uff0c\u901a\u201c\u7f3a\u201d\uff0c\u7f3a\u70b9\u3002&quot;">裨</span>补阙漏，</span><span id="body_3_12" data="means_3_12"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5f97\u5230\u66f4\u591a\u7684\u597d\u5904\u3002&quot;">有所<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5f88\u591a\u7684\u76ca\u5904\u3002&quot;">广益</span></span>。</span> </p> <p id="means_p" class="poem-detail-main-text body-means-p"> <span id="means_3_0" data="body_3_0">侍中、</span><span id="means_3_1" data="body_3_1">侍郎郭攸之、</span><span id="means_3_2" data="body_3_2">费祎、</span><span id="means_3_3" data="body_3_3">董允等人，</span><span id="means_3_4" data="body_3_4">都是善良诚实、心志忠贞纯洁的人，</span><span id="means_3_5" data="body_3_5">他们的志向和心思忠诚无二。</span><span id="means_3_6" data="body_3_6">因此先帝选拔他们留给陛下。</span><span id="means_3_7" data="body_3_7">我认为宫中之事，</span><span id="means_3_8" data="body_3_8">无论事情大小，</span><span id="means_3_9" data="body_3_9">都拿来跟他商讨，</span><span id="means_3_10" data="body_3_10">这样以后再去实施，</span><span id="means_3_11" data="body_3_11">一定能够弥补缺点和疏漏之处。</span><span id="means_3_12" data="body_3_12">得到更多的好处。</span> </p> <p class="poem-detail-main-text" id="body_p"> <span id="body_4_0" data="body_7_16">这是我用以报答先帝尽忠陛下的职责。</span><span id="means_7_17" data="body_7_17">至于处理事务，斟酌情理，</span><span id="means_7_18" data="body_7_18">毫无保留地贡献忠言，</span><span id="means_7_19" data="body_7_19">那是郭攸之、</span><span id="means_7_20" data="body_7_20">费祎、</span><span id="means_7_21" data="body_7_21">董允的责任。</span> </p> <p class="poem-detail-main-text" id="body_p"> <span id="body_8_0" data="means_8_0">愿陛下<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u628a\u8ba8\u4f10\u66f9\u9b4f\u590d\u5174\u6c49\u5ba4\u7684\u4efb\u52a1\u4ea4\u7ed9\u6211\u3002&quot;">托臣以讨贼兴复之效</span>，</span><span id="body_8_1" data="means_8_1">不效，</span><span id="body_8_2" data="means_8_2">则治臣之罪，</span><span id="body_8_3" data="means_8_3">以<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u544a\u6170\uff0c\u544a\u796d\u3002&quot;">告</span>先帝之灵。</span><span id="body_8_4" data="means_8_4">若无<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u53d1\u626c\u5723\u5fb7\u7684\u8a00\u8bba\u3002&quot;">兴德之言</span>，</span><span id="body_8_5" data="means_8_5">则责攸之、</span><span id="body_8_6" data="means_8_6">祎、</span><span id="body_8_7" data="means_8_7">允等之<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u6020\u6162\uff0c\u758f\u5ffd\uff0c\u6307\u4e0d\u5c3d\u804c\u3002&quot;">慢</span>，</span><span id="body_8_8" data="means_8_8">以<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u63ed\u793a\u4ed6\u4eec\u7684\u8fc7\u5931\u3002&quot;"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8868\u660e\uff0c\u663e\u626c\u3002&quot;">彰</span>其<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8fc7\u5931\uff0c\u7f6a\u3002&quot;">咎</span></span>；</span><span id="body_8_9" data="means_8_9">陛下亦宜自谋，</span><span id="body_8_10" data="means_8_10">以<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8be2\u95ee\uff08\u6cbb\u56fd\u7684\uff09\u597d\u9053\u7406\u3002\u8bf9\uff0c\u8be2\u95ee\u3002&quot;">咨诹善道</span>，</span><span id="body_8_11" data="means_8_11"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u8ba4\u8bc6\u91c7\u7eb3\u3002\u5bdf\uff1a\u660e\u5bdf\u3002&quot;">察纳</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u6b63\u786e\u7684\u8a00\u8bba\uff0c\u6b63\u8a00\uff0c\u5408\u7406\u7684\u610f\u89c1\u3002&quot;">雅言</span>，</span><span id="body_8_12" data="means_8_12"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u6df1\u5207\u8ffd\u5ff5\u3002&quot;">深追</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u5218\u5907\u7ed9\u540e\u4e3b\u7684\u9057\u8bcf\uff0c\u89c1\u300a\u4e09\u56fd\u5fd7\u00b7\u8700\u5fd7\u00b7\u5148\u4e3b\u4f20\u300b\u6ce8\u5f15\u300a\u8bf8\u845b\u4eae\u96c6\u300b\uff0c\u8bcf\u4e2d\u8bf4\uff1a\u2018\u52ff\u4ee5\u6076\u5c0f\u800c\u4e3a\u4e4b\uff0c\u52ff\u4ee5\u5584\u5c0f\u800c\u4e0d\u4e3a\u3002\u60df\u8d24\u60df\u5fb7\uff0c\u80fd\u670d\u4e8e\u4eba\u3002\u2019&quot;">先帝<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u7687\u5e1d\u5728\u4e34\u7ec8\u65f6\u6240\u53d1\u7684\u8bcf\u4ee4\u3002&quot;">遗诏</span></span>，</span><span id="body_8_13" data="means_8_13">臣不胜受恩感激。</span> </p> <p id="means_p" class="poem-detail-main-text body-means-p"> <span id="means_8_0" data="body_8_0">希望陛下能够把讨伐曹魏，兴复汉室的任务托付给我，</span><span id="means_8_1" data="body_8_1">若不能完成，</span><span id="means_8_2" data="body_8_2">就治我的罪，</span><span id="means_8_3" data="body_8_3">（从而）用来告慰先帝的在天之灵。</span><span id="means_8_4" data="body_8_4">如果没有振兴圣德的建议，</span><span id="means_8_5" data="body_8_5">那就责备郭攸之、</span><span id="means_8_6" data="body_8_6">费祎、</span><span id="means_8_7" data="body_8_7">董允等人的怠慢。</span><span id="means_8_8" data="body_8_8">来揭示他们的过失；</span><span id="means_8_9" data="body_8_9">陛下也应自行谋划，</span><span id="means_8_10" data="body_8_10">毫无保留地进献忠诚的建议，</span><span id="means_8_11" data="body_8_11">采纳正确的言论，</span><span id="means_8_12" data="body_8_12">深切追念先帝临终留下的教诲。</span><span id="means_8_13" data="body_8_13">我感激不尽。</span> </p> <p class="poem-detail-main-text" id="body_p"> <span id="body_9_0" data="means_9_0">今当远离，</span><span id="body_9_1" data="means_9_1">临<span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u53e4\u4ee3\u5411\u5e1d\u738b\u4e0a\u4e66\u9648\u60c5\u8a00\u4e8b\u7684\u4e00\u79cd\u6587\u4f53\u3002&quot;">表</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u773c\u6cea\u3002&quot;">涕</span><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u843d\u4e0b\u3002&quot;">零</span>，</span><span id="body_9_2" data="means_9_2"><span class="body-zhushi-span" data="&quot;\u4e0d\u77e5\u9053\u8be5\u8bf4\u4e9b\u4ec0\u4e48\u8bdd\u3002\u8fd9\u662f\u8868\u793a\u81ea\u5df1\u53ef\u80fd\u5931\u8a00\u3002\u8c26\u8bcd\u3002&quot;">不知所言</span>。</span> </p> <p id="means_p" class="poem-detail-main-text body-means-p"> <span id="means_9_0" data="body_9_0">今天(我)将要告别陛下远行了，</span><span id="means_9_1" data="body_9_1">面对这份奏表禁不住热泪纵横，</span><span id="means_9_2" data="body_9_2">也不知说了些什么。</span> </p></code></pre><p></p>

entry.title: Hello World
entry.content:
Hello, World程序指的是指在计算机屏幕上输出“Hello, World!”（意为“你好，世界！”）这行字符串的计算机程序。一般来说，这是每一种计算机编程语言中最基本、最简单的程序，亦通常是初学者所编写的第一个程序。它还可以用来确定该语言的编译器、程序开发环境，以及运行环境是否已经安装妥当。

将输出字符串“Hello World”作为第一个示范程序，现在已经成为编程语言学习的传统。“Hello World”示范程序最早出于1972年，由贝尔实验室成员布莱恩·柯林汉撰写的内部技术文件《”A Tutorial Introduction to the Language B” 》之中。不久同作者于1974年所撰写的《Programming in C: A Tutorial》，也延用这个示例；而布莱恩·柯林汉和丹尼斯·里奇以本文件扩编改写的《C程序设计语言》也保留了这个示范程序，此后广泛流传。 –引用于《维基百科》

那么,第一次使用个人博客,依然离不开最熟悉的。
